titles.title: Fort Frederica National Monument Boundary Expansion Act of 2015
A bill to expand the boundary of Fort Frederica National Monument in the State of Georgia, and for other purposes.
Fort Frederica National Monument Boundary Expansion Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Fort Frederica National Monument Boundary Expansion Act of 2015
Expands the boundary of the Fort Frederica National Monument on Saint Simon Island, Georgia. Increases the maximum number of acres that may be included in the monument from 250 to 525 acres.
